ComicInfo.Summary:
Compares Barack Obama's campaign promises to what he'll likely do in office.
Two strips. In the first, the White spy is beheaded after believing he's engineered a jailbreak. In the second, a trick diving board does in the Black Spy.
Standard sports interview cliches, with explanatory remarks.
Story of a donkey that shows up whever someone is dying.
Stills from the movie "Watchmen" with fake dialog.
New gags written for Dave Berg's drawings.
Things that could go wrong with an online education.
Foolish questions and answers concerning the pending US digital tv conversion.
Comic situations that are unlikely to happen during training classes.
The Botchmen wander through all the loose plot ends of the Watchmen story.

ComicInfo.Title: President Obama The Promise Vs. The Reality; Spy Vs. Spy; The Strip Club; Unabridged Sports Cliches; The Story of Deathbed Donkey...And The Rage of Sorrow; MAD's Unheroic Watchmen Outtakes; The Darker Side of The Lighter Side; The Decided Disadvantages of An Online Education; Digital TV FAQs; A MAD Look at Trade Schools; Botchmen; The Fundalini Pages
